Class CourseService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.service.CourseService
@Service public class CourseService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing courses.

Provides functionalities such as creating, updating, approving, rejecting, and deleting courses, as well as managing course modules and filtering published courses. Interacts with CourseRepo, CoursePurchaseRepo, UserService, and CourseUtil.

See Also:
  • CourseRepo
  • CoursePurchaseRepo
  • UserService
  • CourseUtil

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseService

      public CourseService()

  • Method Details

    • create

      public Course create(User instructor, CourseDto dto)
      Creates a new course.

      Validates that the user has the UserRole.INSTRUCTOR role and creates a new Course entity based on the provided CourseDto.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor creating the course
      dto - the CourseDto containing course details
      Returns:
      the created Course entity
      Throws:
      UserCannotCreateCourseException - if the user does not have the UserRole.INSTRUCTOR role

    • approveCourse

      public void approveCourse(User admin, UUID courseId)
      Approves a course, changing its status to CourseStatus.PUBLISHED.

      Validates that the course is not already published and updates its status accordingly.

      Parameters:
      admin - the User entity representing the admin approving the course
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course to approve
      Throws:
      CourseAlreadyPublished - if the course is already published
      AccessDeletedCourseException - if the course has been deleted
      CourseNotFoundException - if the course does not exist

    • rejectCourse

      public void rejectCourse(User admin, UUID courseId, @Valid @Valid CourseRejectionDto dto)
      Rejects a course, changing its status back to CourseStatus.DRAFT.

      Validates that the course is waiting for approval and updates its status accordingly.

      Parameters:
      admin - the User entity representing the admin rejecting the course
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course to reject
      dto - the CourseRejectionDto containing the reason for rejection
      Throws:
      CourseIsNotWaitingApprovalException - if the course is not in the CourseStatus.WAIT_APPROVAL state
      AccessDeletedCourseException - if the course has been deleted
      CourseNotFoundException - if the course does not exist

    • updateCourse

      public void updateCourse(User user, UUID courseId, @Valid @Valid CourseDto dto)
      Updates an existing course with new details.

      Validates that the user has access to the course and updates the course based on the provided CourseDto.

      Parameters:
      user - the User entity representing the user updating the course
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course to update
      dto - the CourseDto containing updated course details
      Throws:
      AccessDeletedCourseException - if the course has been deleted
      CourseNotFoundException - if the course does not exist
      UserHasNoAccessToCourseException - if the user does not have access to the course

    • saveCourse

      public void saveCourse(Course course)
      Saves or updates a course entity.
      Parameters:
      course - the Course entity to save

    • findPublishedCourse

      public Course findPublishedCourse(UUID courseId)
      Finds a published course by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course
      Returns:
      the Course entity representing the published course
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - if the course does not exist or is not published
      AccessDeletedCourseException - if the course has been deleted

    • findCourseByIdAndUser

      public Course findCourseByIdAndUser(@Nullable User user, UUID courseId)
      Finds a course by its unique identifier and enforces access controls based on the user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity representing the user (can be null for public access)
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course
      Returns:
      the Course entity with enforced access controls
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - if the course does not exist
      AccessDeletedCourseException - if the course has been deleted
      UserHasNoAccessToCourseException - if the user does not have access to the course

    • assertUserHasAccessToCourse

      public void assertUserHasAccessToCourse(User user, Course course)
      Asserts that a user has access to a specific course.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity representing the user
      course - the Course entity representing the course
      Throws:
      UserHasNoAccessToCourseException - if the user does not have access to the course

    • assertUserHasAccessToCourseContent

      public void assertUserHasAccessToCourseContent(User user, Course course)
      Asserts that a user has access to the content of a specific course.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity representing the user
      course - the Course entity representing the course
      Throws:
      NoAccessToCourseContentException - if the user does not have access to the course content

    • findAllCourses

      public List<Course> findAllCourses(@NonNull User admin)
      Retrieves all courses, accessible only to admins.
      Parameters:
      admin - the User entity representing the admin
      Returns:
      a list of all Course entities
      Throws:
      OnlyAdminAccessAllCourses - if the user is not an admin

    • findCoursesWaitingForApproval

      public List<Course> findCoursesWaitingForApproval(User user)
      Retrieves all courses that are waiting for approval.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity representing the user (admin)
      Returns:
      a list of Course entities with CourseStatus.WAIT_APPROVAL

    • findPublishedCourses

      public List<PublicCourseDto> findPublishedCourses()
      Retrieves all published courses and converts them to PublicCourseDto.
      Returns:
      a list of PublicCourseDto representing published courses

    • findPurchasedCourses

      public List<Course> findPurchasedCourses(User student)
      Retrieves all courses purchased by a student.
      Parameters:
      student - the User entity representing the student
      Returns:
      a list of Course entities that the student has purchased

    • findCreatedCourses

      public List<Course> findCreatedCourses(User instructor)
      Retrieves all courses created by an instructor.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor
      Returns:
      a list of Course entities created by the instructor

    • deleteCourseAsAdmin

      public void deleteCourseAsAdmin(UUID courseId)
      Deletes a course as an admin by marking it as deleted.
      Parameters:
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course to delete
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - if the course does not exist
      AccessDeletedCourseException - if the course is already deleted

    • reorderCourseModules

      public void reorderCourseModules(User instructor, UUID courseId, List<UUID> modulesOrder)
      Reorders the modules of a course based on the provided module order.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course
      modulesOrder - a list of UUID representing the new order of modules
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the number of modules does not match
      CourseModuleNotFoundException - if a module ID does not exist within the course
      CourseNotFoundException - if the course does not exist
      AccessDeletedCourseException - if the course has been deleted

    • filterPublishedCourses

      public List<PublicCourseDto> filterPublishedCourses(@Nullable String containsFilter)
      Filters published courses based on a provided string filter.
      Parameters:
      containsFilter - the string to filter course titles by (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      a list of PublicCourseDto representing the filtered published courses

    • enforceCourseAccess

      public Course enforceCourseAccess(@Nullable User user, Course course)
      Enforces access controls on a course based on the user's permissions.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity representing the user (can be null for public access)
      course - the Course entity representing the course
      Returns:
      the Course entity with enforced access controls
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if access controls fail unexpectedly
      NoAccessToCourseContentException - if the user does not have access to the course content

    • enforceCoursesAccess

      public List<Course> enforceCoursesAccess(@Nullable User user, List<Course> courses)
      Enforces access controls on a list of courses based on the user's permissions.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity representing the user (can be null for public access)
      courses - the list of Course entities to enforce access controls on
      Returns:
      a list of Course entities with enforced access controls

    • submitCourseForApproval

      public void submitCourseForApproval(User instructor, UUID courseId)
      Submits a course for approval.

      Changes the course status to CourseStatus.WAIT_APPROVAL if it is currently in CourseStatus.DRAFT.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor submitting the course
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course to submit
      Throws:
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the instructor does not own the course
      CourseStatusNotDraftException - if the course is not in the CourseStatus.DRAFT state
      CourseNotFoundException - if the course does not exist
      AccessDeletedCourseException - if the course has been deleted

    • testingDemoteInstructor

      public void testingDemoteInstructor(@NonNull User admin, @NonNull String userId)
      Demotes an instructor to a student. Primarily used for integration testing or admin gifting.
      Parameters:
      admin - the User entity representing the admin performing the demotion
      userId - the unique identifier of the user to demote
